Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People continue to speculate about the upcoming Federal Budget with questions being raised about the government's expenditure and the potential impact it will have on the economy. While some remain optimistic about proposed infrastructure projects and increased spending on essential services others are concerned that rising debt repayments and tax hikes such as the beer tax could threaten the livelihoods of struggling businesses and individuals. noticias Meanwhile the police force in Northern Territories is struggling to cope with increasing crime rates and allegations of political motivation surrounding the cancellation of windfarm projects have been denied by the Federal Energy Minister. On a brighter note ANZ bank recorded an impressive profit reflecting the resilience of the banking industry and growth prospects for the wider economy.
